pages.text: $(wip)$(br2)This page will cover the four speed upgrade tiers.$(br2)Iron, Gold, Diamond, and Netherite. Each tier increases the max batch size and lowers the minimum tick delay. Only the highest tier in a node takes effect, they don't stack.

pages.title: Upgrade Stats
pages.text: $(wip)$(br2)$(l)Default (no upgrade):$() 8 items, 500 mb, 2,000 RF, 20 tick delay$(br2)$(l)Iron:$() 16 items, 1,000 mb, 10,000 RF, 10 tick delay$(br2)$(l)Gold:$() 32 items, 5,000 mb, 50,000 RF, 5 tick delay$(br2)$(l)Diamond:$() 64 items, 20,000 mb, 250,000 RF, 1 tick delay$(br2)$(l)Netherite:$() 10,000 items, 1,000,000 mb, unlimited RF, 1 tick delay
